document.full_text: a federal judge in pennsylvania has tossed out an author's $100 million lawsuit against oprah winfrey for violating the copyright in the political booklet, "how america elects her presidents."
document.title: oprah dodges $100 million suit over fattest president
lines_and_colors: a federal judge in pennsylvania has tossed out an author's $100 million lawsuit against oprah winfrey for violating the copyright in the political booklet, "how america elects her presidents."
